channel.title: Server start error
channel.description:
Why is it that every server made by codeusa messes up for me... i get this error. [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: net/com/codeusa/Server
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: net.com.codusa.Server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248) Could not find the main class: net/com/codeusa/Server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . . [/code]
The path is correct as you can see. here is the BAT scripts: [code]@echo off title meow cd ../build "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m net/com/codeusa/Server pause[/code]
I am running WINDOWS 7. So its (x86) on the program files. anyone know how to solve this? help please.

item.title: Server start error
item.dc:creator: @jaloko jaloko
item.description:
@jaloko wrote:

oh i have 18…19…20…21 tried all 4 of em. Still giving me the middle finger =0

item.title: Server start error
item.dc:creator: @jaloko jaloko
item.description:
@jaloko wrote:

Why is it that every server made by codeusa messes up for me… i get this error. [code]Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: net/com/codeusa/Server

Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: net.com.codusa.Server
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:202)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:190)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:307)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:301)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:248)
Could not find the main class: net/com/codeusa/Server. Program will exit.
Press any key to continue . . .
[/code]

The path is correct as you can see. here is the BAT scripts:

@echo off title meow cd ../build "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.6.0_20\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m net/com/codeusa/Server pause

I am running WINDOWS 7. So its (x86) on the program files. anyone know how to solve this? help please.
